1.1.name: wordpress/zerochat
1.1.description: ZeroChat makes it possible for you to easily add a ZeroIRC channel (chat room) onto your Wordpress installation. ZeroChat can be added to a page simply through the options page on the Dashboard or there is also a shortcode included for use in posts and other pages. ZeroChat also includes a widget in order to place the number of current users in your chartroom on your sidebar.
